meanings.definition: A large, tropical American bird with a crest and brightly colored plumage.
meanings.sent1: Curassows are beautiful birds found in the tropical forests.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of curassows flying gracefully in the jungle.
meanings.sent3: The curious curassows decided to have a colorful feather fashion show.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was as vibrant as a flock of curassows in full plumage.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the majestic curassows left a lasting impression on me.

meanings.definition: The flesh of this bird as food.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious dish using curassows as the main ingredient.
meanings.sent2: Curassows are known for their tender and flavorful meat.
meanings.sent3: The restaurant's specialty was a mouth-watering curassow stew.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the roasted curassows filled the kitchen with a tempting scent.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the grilled curassows was a delightful surprise for the guests.
